list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an ornamental tablet, typically of metal, porcelain, or wood, that is fixed to a wall or other surface in commemoration of a person or event.
a sticky deposit on teeth in which bacteria proliferate.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: plaque around gum margins can lead to gingivitis
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: mảng bám quanh lề kẹo cao su có thể dẫn đến viêm nướu

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a small, distinct, typically raised patch or region resulting from local damage or deposition of material, such as a fatty deposit on an artery wall in atherosclerosis or a site of localized damage of brain tissue in Alzheimer's disease.
